title: Villo Rebuild
processText: I wanted to improve the Brussels Villo app, so I decided to fully remake it. I started by analyzing the existing UI and identifying what didnâ€™t work well, then redesigned it to be clearer and more user-friendly. From there, I gradually expanded the project by adding features and focusing on making the app faster, simpler, and more intuitive for users.

title: MoodTracker
processText: Focused less on UX/UI this time, the main goal was learning how to work with user data. I started this project to explore widgets, system settings and preferences, but was limited as linking widgets to user data requires a paid setup.

title: Portfolio App
processText: For this portfolio project, I wanted to express my vibe and personality through something meaningful. I drew inspiration from a magazine I once created and tried to apply as many SwiftUI animation techniques as possible in this one-pager.
